title: Amazon Freezes Corporate Hiring
description:
Coinbase sees crypto transactions plummet. Block jumps on earnings, PayPal sinks. And Amazon pauses new hires.

$COIN, $PYPL, $SQ, $AMZN, $LYFT

Host: Jackson Cantrell.
